original_title: The Incredible Hulk XXX: A Porn Parody
overview: Widower Dr. David Banner and his lonely colleague Dr. Elaina Marks are trying to find out how sexual frustration can lead to feats of superhuman strength. But Banner goes too far when he experiments with Gamma rays and now when he gets angry, his inner sexual beast is released.
title: The Incredible Hulk XXX: A Porn Parody
